doc.field: KANEB SERVICES INC KAB> 4TH QTR LOSS

Oper shr loss 1.05 dlrs vs profit nine cts Oper net loss 30.5 mln vs profit 3,930,000 Revs 23.9 mln vs 45.6 mln 12 mths Oper shr loss 5.30 dlrs vs profit 34 cts Oper net loss 155.8 mln vs profit 16.0 mln Revs 113.7 mln vs 178.8 mln Note: Oper excludes loss from discontinued operations of 9,127,000 dlrs vs 12.4 mln dlrs for qtr and 28.4 mln dlrs vs 960,000 dlrs for 12 mths.
